purpose: To provide a comprehensive collection of tools, agents, and resources for developing and deploying Agent2Agent (A2A) systems.
principle: To enable seamless communication and interaction between agents, facilitating collaboration and enhanced capabilities.
reusability: The components and tools within the repository are designed to be modular and reusable across various A2A projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply incomplete features and potential instability. Some integrations may not be fully developed or tested.
